product.name: Just Cause 2 Co-Marketing Kit
product.description:
On the island nation of Panau, rival gangs wage war in the streets while the ruthless dictator Baby Panay exercises a system of oppression and corruption against his own people. Somewhere on the island, your friend and mentor Tom Sheldon has disappeared with top-secret intel and millions in Agency cash. As Rico Rodriguez, the Agency's most dangerous weapon, you must infiltrate the island and locate Sheldon, setting off a violent chain of events that will set Panau ablaze. BR>
Key Features ?UL>LI>UNIQUE VERTICAL GAMEPLAY - Take to the air like no other game. Experience total aerial freedom with the unique parachute and dual grapple. LI>UNBELIEVABLE ADRENALINE-FUELLED STUNTS - Freefall, BASE jump, vehicle surf, parasail, skydive, grapple, slingshot, leap between vehicles, hang from helicopters, scale buildings. The impossible is within your grasp.LI>UPGRADED DUAL GRAPPLE - Your best tool is now a weapon. Fire two shots with the grapple hook and attach unwilling enemies to high-speed vehicles, hang them upside down from buildings, tether objects in mid air. The possibilities are as vast as your imagination. LI>DISCOVER THE SECRETS OF PANAU - Explore the island paradise; from sprawling cities, secluded beaches and towering mountain peaks - more than 400 square miles of your own personal playground.LI>EXPERIENCE TRUE FREEDOM - Hundreds of objectives can be completed in any way or order that you choose. When it's time for a break from Agency business, kick back and enjoy all the attractions that Panau has to offer.LI>MASSIVE SELECTION OF VEHICLES - Catch air on a high-speed dirt bike, race across the sea in a power boat, or fire a spread of rockets from an attack chopper - more than 100 land, sea and air vehicles are yours for the taking. /LI>/UL>

product.name: Metro 2033 Comarketing Kit
product.description: <Set in the shattered subway of a post apocalyptic Moscow, Metro 2033 is a story of intensive underground survival were the fate of mankind rests in your hands. <<In 2013 the world was devastated by an apocalyptic event, annihilating almost all mankind and turning the earth's surface into a poisonous wasteland. A handful of survivors took refuge in the depths of the Moscow underground, and human civilization entered a new Dark Age. <<The year is 2033. An entire generation has been born and raised underground, and their besieged Metro Station-Cities struggle for survival, with each other, and the mutant horrors that await outside. <<You are Artyom, born in the last days before the fire, but raised Underground. Having never ventured beyond your Metro Station-City limits, one fateful event sparks a desperate mission to the heart of the Metro system, to warn the remnants of mankind of a terrible impending threat. Your journey takes you from the forgotten catacombs beneath the subway to the desolate wastelands above, where your actions will determine the fate of mankind. <<Use this partner comarketing kit to promote NVIDIA GPUs and Metro 2033 in-store, at events, or on your website.<

product.name: Design Garage
product.description: In Design Garage, you'll be able to interact with and create incredibly photo-realistic images of some of the fastest and most exclusive vehicles on the road. Using the immense processing power of the GeForce GTX 400 series of GPUs, the exotic vehicles in Design Garage are brought to life through Ray Tracing, a rendering technique usually reserved for Hollywood blockbusters that simulates how light reflects, refracts and illuminates a 3D scene.

product.name: Supersonic Sled Demo
product.description: Strap yourself in and get ready to experience the future of gaming realism and interactivity that only the GeForce GTX 400 series of GPUs can provide. Taking advantage of PhysX, CUDA, DirectX 11, and 3D Vision, Supersonic Sled straps you on a high-powered test rocket and hurtles you down a six mile long track in the Nevada desert at speeds in excess of 800 miles an hour. You'll have to avoid falling rocks, destroy buildings and bridges, and avoid flying off the side of a massive cliff.

STICKER DESIGN - Designed to be used primarily on notebooks PCs on the palm rest, the Optimus sticker is required to be used with an NVIDIA GeForce® or IONnTrademark brand sticker (shown on page 4). Title: Need For SpeednTrademark SHIFT |
Publisher: Electronic Arts

Developer: Slightly Mad Studios |
Release Date: September 2009








Description:Need for SpeednTrademark SHIFT is an award-winning authentic racing game that combines the true driver's experience with real-world physics, pixel-perfect car models, and a wide range of authentic race tracks. Need for Speed SHIFT takes players in a different direction to create a simulation experience that replicates the true feeling of driving high-end performance cars.

Key Features:True Driver's Experience - A variety of visual cues delivers the true driver's experience including a three-dimensional HUD that mimics driver head movement, inertia and G-forces. The depth of field also adjusts based on the speed of the car; so when the car is travelling at high speeds the perspective will shift to the distance putting the car/cockpit out of focus.

Driver Profile - What kind of driver are you? Driver profile tracks the player's evolution as a race driver from event to event. This system is made up of a driver's personality on the track, their success rate and any profile points and badges accrued all of which work together to create a tailor-made career and gameplay experience. Driver profile is pervasive throughout all modes: career and online.

Dynamic Crash Effect - When the player hits a static object or opponent car, the player will feel like they are 'taking damage'. A combination of visual and audio effects will leave the player disorientated and briefly disrupt the race.

Total Customization - Need for Speed SHIFT features a comprehensive customization option that lets the player tailor every aspect of the cars performance and styling. Go under the hood to upgrade and tune your vehicle to increase its performance. The visual customization system allows players to personalize both the exterior and trick out the interior to reflect their individual style and preferences.

Photo Real Cars and Tracks - Nearly 70 licensed cars are available including the Pagani Zonda F, Audi RS4, and Porsche 911 GT3 RSR. There is also over 15 real-world locations like Willow Springs and Laguna Seca as well as fictional circuits like downtown London and Tokyo.


<


<




Description

PRINT AD TEMPLATE/WEB LANDING PAGE KIT
Description
This full-page template leverages the endorsement of the TWIMTBP program for use in ads featuring NVIDIA products. The lower portion of the ad is designed to be tailored to fit individual partner messaging and can range from featuring specific technology, to promoting several systems featuring NVIDIA technology.
Requirements
Artwork must be approved by NVIDIA prior to publication. Ads must be accompanied by a minimum 3-week run of a web banner on the partner's website. Ad placements should be coordinated with NVIDIA so that exposure can be measured. Do not re-size, alter or remove any logo’s, ratings information, copyright information or any component of the game image. Please contact Partner Marketing at partner_marketing@nvidia.com to obtain any necessary approval’s 2 weeks prior to your due date!

<















WEB BANNERS / ONLINE ADS
Description
These templates leverage the endorsement of the TWIMTBP program for use in ads featuring NVIDIA products. The templates are immediately available in three popular sizes, 160x600, 728x90, and 300x250. NVIDIA can create custom sizes in the case of a significant placement.
Requirements
Artwork must be approved by NVIDIA prior to publication. Ad placements should be coordinated with NVIDIA so that exposure can be measured. Screen captures of the running ads must be provided to NVIDIA for auditing and exposure tracking. Please contact Partner Marketing at partner_marketing@nvidia.com to obtain any necessary approval’s.
Banner Buddy
This title appears in the the NVIDIA Banner Buddy program. Drop a small bit of code into your website and not only will you add some pizzazz with constantly changing cool graphics, but your site will also receive reciprical exposure on nZone. Go to http://www.nzone.com/object/nzone_bannerbuddy_home.html for more information.

<















POSTER
Description
This 18" x 24" poster is designed to grab attention and pull viewers into the message.
Requirements
Artwork must be approved by NVIDIA prior to publication. Poster placements should be coordinated with NVIDIA so that exposure can be measured. Do not re-size, alter or remove any logo’s, ratings information, copyright information or any component of the game image. Please contact Partner Marketing at partner_marketing@nvidia.com to obtain any necessary approval’s
2 weeks prior to your due date!

<

NVIDIA's retail programs support your co-marketing efforts by magnifying the impression of your campaigns at retail point of sale. The programs are designed to impress consumers on the significance of purchasing the right graphics solution to run the top games and applications. Research shows that in addition to impact at point of sale, a message delivered at retail can effectively be carried to an E-tail or mail-order purchase decision.


For any given title a combination of the following items are delivered to retailers, NVIDIA-sponsored game centers and LAN parties. Placement at retail of any of these items is subject to NVIDIA merchandising agreements with the retailers. Placement may also be subject to specific alignment relative to partners running advertising (print or online).














MOUSE PADS
Description
Designed for hard top pads, 7.5" x 8.5" with a thin sponge rubber base. This item is a premium gift, collectible or leave-behind.


POSTERS
Description
(See "Posters" in section above) This 18" x 24" poster is designed to grab attention and pull viewers into the message.

SHELF TALKERS
Description
The base size of this item is 3" x 6". It is designed to print with the same image on both sides. The size may vary if required by a specific retailer. The primary method of attachment is a tab that fits in the shelf channel.


VERTICAL BANNERS
Description
These banner designs are 3' x 8', for printing on one side. They can be used in the channel or for special events and trade shows.

Title: Resident Evil 5 |
Publisher: Capcom

Developer: Capcom |
Release Date: September 2009







Description: Somewhere in Africa, innocent villagers are transforming into ruthless abominations. Chris Redfield and his new partner, Sheva Alomar, must stop whatever is causing the disturbing turn of events. Now featuring online co-op, players can experience the next generation of fear together as terror moves out of the shadows and into the light of day.

Fans that pick up the PC version will be the first to experience stereoscopic 3D out of screen effects as their living rooms are transformed into the world of Kijuju. Infected Majini coming at players from every angle, dust flying in and out of screen and the scariest bosses to date are taken up a notch . Resident Evil 5 PC is a whole new level of fear players will never forget. The game also supports Stereoscopic 3D in all of its cut scenes - an industry first.

Key Features:Two Playable Characters - Chris Redfield, protagonist of the original Resident Evil and Resident Evil: Code Veronica, returns and is joined by new playable character Sheva Alomar, an African BSAA agent tasked with investigating the epidemic.

Two Player Online Co-op - New cooperatively-focused gameplay revolutionizes the way that Resident Evil is played. Chris and Sheva must work together to survive new challenges and fight dangerous hordes of enemies.

Next Generation of Fear - Features groundbreaking graphics that utilize an advanced version of Capcom's proprietary game engine, MT Framework, which powered the hit titles Devil May Cry 4, Lost Planet and Dead Rising.

"Quick-Select" Inventory System - Improved inventory system allows items to be traded between characters. To add to the intensity, all inventory management is done in real time; items can even be assigned to the directional pad for instant access.

New Control Schemes - Features new modernized third-person action game control variations as well as the return of the traditional Resident Evil 4 control schemes.

New Enemies Bring New Challenges - Enemies boast increased speed and intelligence, making them as dangerous alone as they are in groups.

Powerful New Weapons - The number of weapon variations has been greatly increased providing new ways to keep enemies at bay.

Fear Light as much as Shadow - Lighting effects provide a new level of suspense as players attempt to survive in both harsh sunlight and extreme darkness.


<

PRINT AD TEMPLATE/WEB LANDING PAGE KIT
Description
This full-page template leverages the endorsement of the TWIMTBP program for use in ads featuring NVIDIA products. The lower portion of the ad is designed to be tailored to fit individual partner messaging and can range from featuring specific technology, to promoting several systems featuring NVIDIA technology.
Requirements
Artwork must be approved by NVIDIA prior to publication. Ads must be accompanied by a minimum 3-week run of a web banner on the partner's website. Ad placements should be coordinated with NVIDIA so that exposure can be measured. Do not re-size, alter or remove any logo’s, ratings information, copyright information or any component of the game image. Please contact
Partner Marketing at partner_marketing@nvidia.com to obtain any necessary approvals 2 weeks prior to your due date!

<















WEB BANNERS / ONLINE ADS
Description
These templates leverage the endorsement of the TWIMTBP program for use in ads featuring NVIDIA products. The templates are immediately available in three popular sizes, 160x600, 728x90, and 300x250. NVIDIA can create custom sizes in the case of a significant placement.
Requirements
Artwork must be approved by NVIDIA prior to publication. Ad placements should be coordinated with NVIDIA so that exposure can be measured. Screen captures of the running ads must be provided to NVIDIA for auditing and exposure tracking. Please contact Partner Marketing at partner_marketing@nvidia.com to obtain any necessary approval’s.
Banner Buddy
This title appears in the the NVIDIA Banner Buddy program. Drop a small bit of code into your website and not only will you add some pizzazz with constantly changing cool graphics, but your site will also receive reciprical exposure on nZone. Go to http://www.nzone.com/object/nzone_bannerbuddy_home.html for more information.

<















POSTER
Description
This 18" x 24" poster is designed to grab attention and pull viewers into the message. Partners can use the poster to give away at tradeshows, send to your brick and mortar customers, etc.
Requirements
Artwork must be approved by NVIDIA prior to publication. Poster placements should be coordinated with NVIDIA so that exposure can be measured. Do not re-size, alter or remove any logo’s, ratings information, copyright information or any component of the game image. Please contact Partner Marketing at partner_marketing@nvidia.com to obtain any necessary approval’s 2 weeks prior to your due date!

<






-->




NVIDIA's retail programs support your co-marketing efforts by magnifying the impression of your campaigns at retail point of sale. The programs are designed to impress consumers on the significance of purchasing the right graphics solution to run the top games and applications. Research shows that in addition to impact at point of sale, a message delivered at retail can effectively be carried to an E-tail or mail-order purchase decision.


For any given title a combination of the following items are delivered to retailers, NVIDIA-sponsored game centers and LAN parties. Placement at retail of any of these items is subject to NVIDIA merchandising agreements with the retailers. Placement may also be subject to specific alignment relative to partners running advertising (print or online).














MOUSE PADS
Description
Designed for hard top pads, 7.5" x 8.5" with a thin sponge rubber base.

POSTERS
Description
(See "Posters" in section above) This 18" x 24" poster is designed to grab attention and pull viewers into the message.

SHELF TALKERS
Description
The base size of this item is 3" x 6". It should be printed with the same image on both sides. The size may vary if required. The primary method of attachment is a tab that fits in the shelf channel.


VERTICAL BANNERS
Description
These banners are 3' x 8', printed on one side and are produced on-demand. They can be used in the channel or for special events and trade shows.

product.name: NVIDIA Tesla Personal Supercomputer Badge Requirements/Guidelines
product.description:
To use this badge, the following specifications must be met:
• System specification meets minimum requirements
3 x Tesla C1060, in dual-wide PCI-E x16 slots
1 x Quad Core CPU (min 2.33GHz)
4GB system memory per GPU (min 12GB)
Linux 64-bit or Windows XP 64-bit
1200W Power Supply
Acoustics not to exceed 45dbA
• System must pass NVIDIA Tesla self validation tests and test results sent to NVIDIA.
• At least one qualifying pre-configured SKU must be available online on partner’s Web site.
• To use this badge, partner must have executed an NVIDIA Tesla Preferred Provider Agreement and be a valid NVIDIA Tesla Preferred Provider or partner must have executed a Tesla Partner Logo License Agreement.

product.name: Quadro NVS 295
product.description: <The NVIDIA® Quadro® NVS 295 high resolution dual-display business graphics solution, designed for small form factor systems, delivers a reliable hardware and software platform for a stable environment and robust IT management tools for seamless enterprise deployment. Featuring NVIDIA® nView® display software and support for up to two 30’’ displays at 2560x1600 resolutions, business professionals can maximize productivity through increased desktop real estate and advanced application management tools. Quadro NVS 295 is tested on leading business applications and designed to meet the needs of today’s most demanding business user. <<This datasheet provides an overview of the product's features and specifications.<

product.name: Quadro FX 3800 Datasheet
product.description: <Take your inspiration even further with the NVIDIA® Quadro® FX 3800, the unrivaled professional graphics solution among Fortune 1,000 companies. Featuring the NVIDIA® CUDATM parallel computing architecture, 30-bit color accuracy, and automatic configuration of application display settings, Quadro FX 3800 delivers a power efficient, full featured, ultimate performance experience. Plus, design and video professionals can take advantage of NVIDIA® SLI® Multi OS technology to run multiple Windows or Linux- based applications with GPU acceleration from a single system - eliminating the need for dual systems.<<This datasheet provides an overview of the product's features and specifications.<

product.name: NVIDIA Tesla - CUDA Demos
product.description:
NBODY
Nbody is a simple CUDA demo you can run on your laptop. It simulates the interactions of "N" bodies or stars in a
stellar system.<- rename .zi_ file to .zip
- unzip file
- Run nbody-gpu.bat
- Run nbody-cpu.bat

This will run nbody on the CPU and the GPU on your system.You must have a CUDA-enabled GPU in your laptop.<<AxeKTM Demo
-----------
This is actually a video of a demo and is a Windows XP executable. It shows a oil & gas seismic exploration algorithm that images the ground to look for soil structure<

product.name: NVIDIA Tesla - CUDA Demos
product.description:
NBODY
Nbody is a simple CUDA demo you can run on your laptop. It simulates the interactions of "N" bodies or stars in a
stellar system.<- rename .zi_ file to .zip
- unzip file
- Run nbody-gpu.bat
- Run nbody-cpu.bat

This will run nbody on the CPU and the GPU on your system.You must have a CUDA-enabled GPU in your laptop.<<AxeKTM Demo
-----------
This is actually a video of a demo and is a Windows XP executable. It shows a oil & gas seismic exploration algorithm that images the ground to look for soil structure<

product.name: Customer-ready presentations for Tesla
product.description:
Tesla-detailed-Ovrw
- This is the full slide deck with as much information about Tesla and CUDA applications as possible<<Tesla-brief-Ovrw
- This is a condensed slide deck which hits the major points<<Tesla-verybrief-Ovrw
- This is the elevator pitch on Tesla. It can be shortened further by removing the "Programming the GPU" section.<<The Tesla Value
- This slide deck helps customers choose the right CUDA platform and highlights the advantages of Tesla for high-performance computing<<S1070 Detailed Tech Info
- This slide deck gives technical details about Tesla S1070, itssystem management software, and how it hooks up to host servers
<

product.name: NVIDIA Tesla Personal Supercomputer Webinar Replay
product.description: The new market opportunity available to you as an NVIDIA partner to address the supercomputing market with NVIDIA Tesla solutions. An overview of NVIDIA CUDA Technology and the performance benefits users are experiencing with CUDA-based applications. Details on recommended configurations for Tesla Personal Computers and how to validate your solution for use with the Tesla Personal Supercomputer Badge. Next steps to learn more about NVIDIA Tesla products, CUDA Technology and to deliver Tesla Personal Supercomputersolutions to market.

product.name: SLI with CUDA Overview
product.description:
The Best Gaming Platform in the world just got better - Experience Immersive NVIDIA PhysXnTrademark Technology and new multi-monitor support.
The newest generation of SLI® technology brings multi-monitor support for gaming immersion along with new NVIDIA® CUDAnTrademark-enabled applications like NVIDIA® PhysXnTrademark technology. What’s more, NVIDIA SLI is available for all major CPU platforms, including AMD, Intel Core 2, and now Intel Core i7. Surround yourself with amazing graphics, breathtaking physical effects, and accelerate your most performance hungry games and applications.

product.name: Far Cry 2
product.description:
NOW AVAILABLE
Far Cry® 2
"NVIDIA Recommended" Co-branded Print Ad Template
"NVIDIA Recommended" Online Ad Template
"NVIDIA Recommended" Co-branded Poster
"NVIDIA Recommended" Sell Sheet
"NVIDIA Recommended" Sticker
"NVIDIA Recommended" Box Flap
"NVIDIA Recommended" Mouse Pad
"NVIDIA Recommended" Shelf Talkers
"NVIDIA Recommended" Vertical Banner
Screenshots
<





CALL NOW
Contact Your NVIDIA Rep
Contact Partner_Marketing@nvidia.com for assistance with obtaining any of the following assets. Assets are presented on a first come, first serve basis and your manager will be able to advise you on what assets are still available.

<






Title: Assets Update - Far Cry® 2|
Publisher: Ubisoft

Developer: Ubisoft |
Release Date: Fall 2008





Description: Far Cry® 2 is a true open-world FPS where every decision you make affects the outcome of the game. The first sequel to the award winning franchise takes you to one of the most beautiful and hostile environments in the world - AFRICA. You are a gun for hire, trapped in a war-torn African state, stricken with malaria and forced to make deals with corrupt warlords. Your mission is to hunt down and kill The Jackal. This evil arms dealer has been perpetuating this conflict for years, wreaking havoc on the land an all of its innocent people. Run, swim, drive, fly, shoot, fight and smash your way through over 50km² of open world. Beware though, sometimes the hunter can become the hunted.

Key Features:OPEN WORLD - Experience real freedom while roaming in more than 50km2 without any loading. Choose your own path in this vast environment and explore a living African world.
DUNIA ENGINE - The award winning Ubisoft Montreal dev team has tailor-made this new engine for Far Cry® 2. It delivers the most realistic destructible environments, amazing special effects such as dynamic fire and storm effects, real-time day and night cycle, dynamic music system and non-scripted enemy A.I.
FIRE - Feel the heat of the most realistic fire ever seen in a video game! Use wind and propagation to surround and trap your enemies. Grab your Molotov cocktails or flamethrowers to take out your enemies.
DESTRUCTIBLE ENVIRONMENTS - No more obstacles: Everything is breakable and alterable, even in Multiplayer mode. The DUNIA engine's RealTree technology also delivers the most realistic nature deterioration system ever.
NON-SCRIPTED AI - Medics will drag wounded soldiers to safety. Grunts will come to fear you. Your reputation and in-game actions will make enemies drop their guns and run for their lives. Feel the tension of never knowing just how an enemy will react.
A HUGE ADVENTURE - Fight for two rival factions, and make your way up to your primary target by any means necessary. Take on over 70 side missions to earn valuable information, new weapons and vehicles. Up to 100+ hours of gameplay depending on what missions you decide to take on.
MULTIPLAYER - Challenge your friends but watch your back - you never know who your true friends are and who might betray you! All the single player technical features are also present in multiplayer mode.








PRINT AD TEMPLATE
Description
This full-page template leverages the endorsement of the TWIMTBP program for use in ads featuring NVIDIA products. The lower portion of the ad is designed to be tailored to fit individual partner messaging and can range from featuring specific technology, to promoting several systems featuring NVIDIA technology. Alternately, the "software" portion can be integrated into a website as a large banner with products appearing underneath.
Requirements
Artwork must be approved by NVIDIA prior to publication.
Availability
To prevent over-saturation and to foster strategic placement, availability of this template is limited. When the target exposure is reached the template will be retired and will no longer be approved for use.
Deliverables
The template is available two ways. 1) As a layered PSD file suitable for your customization. 2) Furnished as final art files customized to your specification. Artwork customization - 2 week turnaround.

<















ONLINE AD TEMPLATES
Description
Templates are available in three popular sizes, 160x600, 728x90, and 300x250. NVIDIA can create custom sizes in the case of a significant placement.
Requirements
Artwork must be approved by NVIDIA prior to publication. Screen captures of the running ads must be provided to NVIDIA for auditing.
Availability
To prevent over-saturation and to foster strategic placement, availability is limited. When the target exposure is reached the templates will be retired and will no longer be approved for use.
Deliverables
The templates are available two ways. 1) As a layered customizable PSD file. 2) As final art files customized to your specification. Artwork customization - 1 week turnaround.


Banner Buddy
This title appears in the the NVIDIA Banner Buddy program. Drop a small bit of code into your website and not only will you add some pizzazz with constantly changing cool graphics, but your site will also receive reciprocal exposure on nZone. Go to http://www.nzone.com/object/nzone_bannerbuddy_home.html for more information.

<















"NVIDIA RECOMMENDED" STICKER
Description
This 1.75" x 2.75" sticker leverages the endorsement of NVIDIA GPUs by the publisher. It is designed to be used on retail hardware packaging but can also be used as a small premium item. Other uses may be approved as requested.
Deliverables
The sticker is available as a PSD file suitable for printing.


"NVIDIA RECOMMENDED" BOX FLAP
Description
This artwork is designed to be incorporated into the printing of retail hardware packaging. Other uses may be approved as requested.
Availability
Availability is only limited by preemptive exclusivity agreements.
Deliverables
The artwork is available as a PSD file suitable for incorporating into package artwork.

<




Sticker <



Box Flap
<











POSTER
Description
This 18" x 24" poster is designed to grab attention and pull viewers into the message.
Availability
Availability is only limited by preemptive exclusivity agreements.
Deliverables
The poster is available three ways. 1) As a PSD file suitable for partner co-branding/messaging and printing on your own. 2) Printed with generic messaging in lots of 100 at a cost of $150 per lot. (Discount pricing available on quantities over 500 posters) The cost of up to 200 posters is waived with a minimum of two ad placements (print, online, or combination). 3) Custom printed with your co-branding/messaging. 500 posters @ $750+ship including artwork alterations. (1000 @ $850+ship)

<












NVIDIA's retail programs support our partners' co-marketing efforts by magnifying the impression of your campaigns at retail point of sale. The programs are designed to impress consumers on the significance of purchasing the right graphics solution to run the top games and applications. Research shows that in addition to impact at point of sale, a message delivered at retail can effectively be carried to an E-tail or mail-order purchase decision.


For any given title a combination of the following items are delivered to retailers, NVIDIA-sponsored game centers and LAN parties. Placement at retail of any of these items is subject to NVIDIA merchandising agreements with the retailers. Placement may also be subject to specific alignment relative to partners running advertising (print or online).














SELL SHEETS
Description
Printed in full color on both sides of an 8.5" x 11" glossy, these sell sheets are designed to promote the awareness of a specific title and the NVIDIA graphics technology it uses. Sheets are 3-hole drilled for convenient insertion into sales associate binders. The front is an adaptation of the print ad template shown above and the back is a recreation of the publisher's sell sheet.


MOUSE PADS
Description
Hard top pads, 7.5" x 8.5" with a thin sponge rubber base. This item is a premium gift, collectible or leave-behind.


POSTERS
Description
(See "Posters" in section above) This 18" x 24" poster is designed to grab attention and pull viewers into the message. Even retailers with strict planograms permit posters in employee areas such as break rooms.


SHELF TALKERS
Description
The base size of this item is 3" x 6". It is printed with the same image on both sides. The size may vary if required by a specific retailer. The primary method of attachment is a tab that fits in the shelf channel.


VERTICAL BANNERS
Description
These banners are 3' x 8', printed on one side and are produced on-demand. They can be used in the channel or for special events and trade shows. Portable stands are available on loan or for purchase.


SALES REP TRAINING
Online Training
NVIDIA’s online retail sales training reaches more than 1,700 store managers and sales representatives nationwide and includes Best Buy, Comp USA and others.
In-Store Training
Twice per month, a team of more than 35 NVIDIA associates visit over 400 retailers in the top markets. The associates focus on product awareness, training, and compliance checks. They’re able to deliver product messaging as well as collateral, demos and merchandise.

<



Mouse Pads <


Shelf Talker/Dangler <

These screenshots can be incorporated into presentations, printed collateral, packaging and signage that feature NVIDIA products. The files are available at a 1600x1200 resolution. The following caption must appear on, under, or near the screenshot(s): "Far Cry 2 image(s) captured on NVIDIA GPU. Provided by Ubisoft."

product.name: Copy Blocks - NVIDIA® GeForce_9300_9400_GPU
product.description:
Packs a Punch
Get 16-cores of DirectX® 10 graphics and NVIDIA® CUDAnTrademark technology parallel processing horsepower with NVIDIA GeForce® 9-Series motherboard GPUs. Featuring Hybrid SLI®, PureVideo® HD, and PhysX technology, GeForce 9-Series mGPUs turbo-charge your Optimized PC. Expect more from motherboard graphics: -Good enough” graphics are no longer good enough.

product.name: Copy Blocks - Quadro CX
product.description: Creativity is not just your passion, it’s your business. The NVIDIA® Quadro® CX is the accelerator for Adobe® Creative Suite® 4—giving you the performance, tools, and reliability you need to maximize your creativity. With Quadro CX you can encode your H.264 videos at lightning-fast speeds with the NVIDIA CUDAnTrademark-enabled plug-in for Adobe Premiere® Pro CS4, accelerate rendering time for advanced effects, and accurately see what your deliverable will look like with 30-bit color or uncompressed 10-bit/12-bit SDI before final output*. Quadro CX is also engineered and optimized by NVIDIA to ensure your system works when you need it. Plus, Quadro CX is designed and optimized for Adobe Creative Suite 4.

product.name: GeForce - The Force Within On-Demand Training
product.description: <PC solutions powered by an NVIDIA® GeForce® graphics processor offer your customers a set of advanced technologies uniquely suited for today’s most performance demanding visual computing applications. The ability to extend the capabilities of your customer’s PC with benefits only available from NVIDIA* represents a significant sales opportunity and value proposition not available from the competition. The Force Within toolset provides you with the keys to differentiate and emphasize the GeForce advantage to help drive sales and deliver more value.<<View this brief On-Demand training with Product Manager Justin Walker to learn more about the 4 key technologies that comprise the Force Within - PhysX, CUDA, Stereoscopic 3D,& SLI, as well as tools you can use to differentiate your solutions using GeForce - The Force Within.<

product.name: Copy Blocks - NVIDIA® GeForce® 9400 GT
product.description: Your PC is now more visual than ever. Realize more vibrant photos, smoother videos and more realistic gaming with the NVIDIA® GeForce® 9400 GT GPU. By offloading tasks from the CPU, this graphics card allows you to share, edit and manage your photos and videos easily. Enjoy an improved 3D user experience, astounding video-watching with NVIDIA® PureVideo® HD technology and lifelike game play at the lowest price point in NVIDIA’s GeForce 9 series GPUs. And with a 2x performance increase over the 8400 GS GPU, playing the latest PC games just got a whole lot smoother.

product.name: Copy Blocks - GeForce GTX280 & GTX 260
product.description: <Get pulled deeper into the gaming experience than ever before with next generation NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 200 GPUs. GeForce GTX 280 and GTX 260 make games - including Unreal Tournament® 3, Assassin’s CreednTrademark, Call of Duty® 4: Modern WarfarenTrademark and S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Clear Sky - feel like the real thing. High definition worlds crackle and hum with cinema-quality clarity. Lifelike characters behave with such realistic intensity that your palms sweat and your heart races. Objects react to the forces of nature exactly as nature intended. And with 50% better performance than previous generation graphics processors, you get it all… No lag. No dropped frames. No compromises.<<Beyond the field of play, the GeForce GTX 200 GPUs seamlessly shifts intense processing tasks from the CPU to the GPU. Dive into the latest Blu-ray movie, run theFolding @homeprotein-folding application to help cure diseases, browse your favorite web sites in 3D with PicLens, or transcode video to a personal video player up to 7X faster than the CPU.<<With the NVIDIA GeForce GTX 200 GPUs, both performance and immersion are absolute.<

<
View this On-Demand Training module with Ujesh Desai, General Manager of Desktop GPUs at NVIDIA, you will learn:<

How to leverage the Optimized PC message to differentiate your product offering and earn more margin. What tools are available from NVIDIA to help you deliver the Optimized PC message to your customers?

product.name: Web Landing Page Template - NVIDIA® GeForce® 9800 GTX
product.description: <The NVIDIA® GeForce® 9800 GTX-based graphics card raises the performance bar by enabling full-throttle lifelike game play at intense resolutions while providing optimal power management with HybridPowernTrademark technology. The PureVideo® HD engine delivers unmatched video and movie quality with spectacular picture clarity featuring scene-optimized color and contrast enhancement. And when coupled with nForce® SLI®-ready motherboards, provides amplified performance up to 2x in a dual SLI configuration and up to 2.8x in 3-way SLI* mode. Packing more performance at an exceptional value, this GPU offers extreme HD gaming and a first-class entertainment experience.<<*Check <A href="http://www.nvidia.com">www.nvidia.com for supported motherboards. <

And when coupled with nForce® SLI®-ready motherboards, provides amplified performance up to 2x in a dual SLI configuration and up to 2.8x in 3-way SLI* mode. Packing more performance at an exceptional value, this GPU offers extreme HD gaming and a first-class entertainment experience.<<*Check <A href="http://www.nvidia.com">www.nvidia.com for supported motherboards. <<<

product.name: Copy Blocks - NVIDIA® GeForce® 9800 GX2
product.description: Beautifully designed and engineered for extreme graphics performance, the NVIDIA® GeForce® 9800 GX2 is an über-powered, dual GPU--based graphics card that provides a complete, high definition entertainment and gaming solution for the PC. With NVIDIA HybridPowernTrademark technology and two on-board GPUs, GeForce 9800 GX2 is bar-none the fastest graphics card available -up to 50% faster than GeForce 8800 Ultra. When paired with an additional 9800 GX2-based card and a 7 Series NVIDIA nForce® motherboard, this Quad NVIDIA SLI® technology solution creates the most awe-inspiring, screaming fast NVIDIA gaming platform to date. Be blown away by scorching frame rates, true-to-life extreme HD gaming, and picture-perfect Blu-ray and HD DVD movies with ultra-smooth playback.

product.name: Frontlines: Fuel of War
product.description:
NOW AVAILABLE
Frontlines: Fuel of War
"NVIDIA Recommended" Co-branded Print Ad Template
"NVIDIA Recommended" Online Ad Template
"NVIDIA Recommended" Co-branded Poster
"NVIDIA Recommended" Sell Sheet
"NVIDIA Recommended" Sticker
"NVIDIA Recommended" Box Flap
"NVIDIA Recommended" Mouse Pad
"NVIDIA Recommended" Shelf Talkers
"NVIDIA Recommended" Vertical Banner
Screenshots
<





CALL NOW
Contact Your NVIDIA Rep
Contact Partner_Marketing@nvidia.com for assistance with obtaining any of the following assets. Assets are presented on a first come, first serve basis and your manager will be able to advise you on what assets are still available.

<






Title: Assets Update - Frontlines: Fuel of War |
Publisher: THQ Inc.

Developer: Kaos Studios |
Release Date: February 2008





Description: From the creators of Desert Combat and the Battlefield 2 R&D team comes the next-generation in first person shooters.

Based upon actual locations in Central Asia, the player embarks on an epic campaign featuring 7 unique theaters of war. In a world ravaged by a global energy crisis, environmental decay, and a new economic depression, the story follows a division of Western Coalition soldiers - The Stray Dogs - through a dark, vision of our future. Players assume the role of an elite soldier in the Stray Dogs on an epic crusade against the Red Star Alliance to control the last of the world's oil reserves.

Frontlines: Fuel of War offers extensive multiplayer game play supporting up to 64 players on PC via LAN or Internet and combines cinematic, open world game play and a revolutionary Frontline Combat System to deliver the most intense FPS to date.

Key Features: Frontline Combat System - In both single player and multiplayer, players join the forces on the frontline that result in focused combat and increased intensity while allowing player choice.

Open World Environment - In both single player and multiplayer, players can create their own path to victory with non-linear mission objectives and destructible environments. The player chips away at the battle instead of standard die and redo system.

Next Generation Firepower - Over 60 next generation vehicles and weapons inspired by military designs of the near future. Including Jets, helicopters, tanks, APC's and more.

Customizable Soldier System - Character customization allows you to represent your play style through character choices, weapon load out and role specialization.

Advanced Team Play - Supports up to 32 players on Console and 64 players on PC via LAN or Internet with shared targeting systems, squad based VOIP and more.








PRINT AD TEMPLATE
Description
This full-page template leverages the endorsement of the TWIMTBP program for use in ads featuring NVIDIA products. The lower portion of the ad is designed to be tailored to fit individual partner messaging and can range from featuring specific technology, to promoting several systems featuring NVIDIA technology. Alternately, the "software" portion can be integrated into a website as a large banner with products appearing underneath.
Requirements
Artwork must be approved by NVIDIA prior to publication.
Availability
To prevent over-saturation and to foster strategic placement, availability of this template is limited. When the target exposure is reached the template will be retired and will no longer be approved for use.
Deliverables
The template is available two ways. 1) As a layered PSD file suitable for your customization. 2) Furnished as final art files customized to your specification. Artwork customization - 2 week turnaround.

<















ONLINE AD TEMPLATES
Description
Templates are available in three popular sizes, 160x600, 728x90, and 300x250. NVIDIA can create custom sizes in the case of a significant placement.
Requirements
Artwork must be approved by NVIDIA prior to publication. Screen captures of the running ads must be provided to NVIDIA for auditing.
Availability
To prevent over-saturation and to foster strategic placement, availability is limited. When the target exposure is reached the templates will be retired and will no longer be approved for use.
Deliverables
The templates are available two ways. 1) As a layered customizable PSD file. 2) As final art files customized to your specification. Artwork customization - 1 week turnaround.


Banner Buddy
This title appears in the the NVIDIA Banner Buddy program. Drop a small bit of code into your website and not only will you add some pizzazz with constantly changing cool graphics, but your site will also receive reciprical exposure on nZone. Go to http://www.nzone.com/object/nzone_bannerbuddy_home.html for more information.

<















"NVIDIA RECOMMENDED" STICKER
Description
This 1.75" x 2.75" sticker leverages the endorsement of NVIDIA GPUs by the publisher. It is designed to be used on retail hardware packaging but can also be used as a small premium item. Other uses may be approved as requested.
Deliverables
The sticker is available as a PSD file suitable for printing.


"NVIDIA RECOMMENDED" BOX FLAP
Description
This artwork is designed to be incorporated into the printing of retail hardware packaging. Other uses may be approved as requested.
Availability
Availability is only limited by preemptive exclusivity agreements.
Deliverables
The artwork is available as a PSD file suitable for incorporating into package artwork.

<




Sticker <



Box Flap
<











POSTER
Description
This 18" x 24" poster is designed to grab attention and pull viewers into the message.
Availability
Availability is only limited by preemptive exclusivity agreements.
Deliverables
The poster is available three ways. 1) As a PSD file suitable for partner co-branding/messaging and printing on your own. 2) Printed with generic messaging in lots of 100 at a cost of $150 per lot. (Discount pricing available on quantities over 500 posters) The cost of up to 200 posters is waived with a minimum of two ad placements (print, online, or combination). 3) Custom printed with your co-branding/messaging. 500 posters @ $750+ship including artwork alterations. (1000 @ $850+ship)

<












NVIDIA's retail programs support your co-marketing efforts by magnifying the impression of your campaigns at retail point of sale. The programs are designed to impress consumers on the significance of purchasing the right graphics solution to run the top games and applications. Research shows that in addition to impact at point of sale, a message delivered at retail can effectively be carried to an E-tail or mail-order purchase decision.


For any given title a combination of the following items are delivered to retailers, NVIDIA-sponsored game centers and LAN parties. Placement at retail of any of these items is subject to NVIDIA merchandising agreements with the retailers. Placement may also be subject to specific alignment relative to partners running advertising (print or online).














MOUSE PADS
Description
Hard top pads, 7.5" x 8.5" with a thin sponge rubber base. This item is a premium gift, collectible or leave-behind. They are available in lots of 250 @ $2.25ea and 500 @ $1.95ea.


POSTERS
Description
(See "Posters" in section above) This 18" x 24" poster is designed to grab attention and pull viewers into the message. Even retailers with strict planograms permit posters in employee areas such as break rooms.


VERTICAL BANNERS
Description
These banners are 3' x 8', printed on one side and are produced on-demand at $225 ea. They can be used in the channel or for special events and trade shows. Portable stands are available on loan or for purchase.

<



Mouse Pads <


Vertical Banner <
<

<





Description

These screenshots can be incorporated into presentations, printed collateral, packaging and signage that feature NVIDIA products. The files are available at a 1600x1200 resolution. The following caption must appear on, under, or near the screenshot(s): "Frontlines: Fuel of War image(s) captured on NVIDIA GPU. Provided by THQ."








Example





























<<

<












GAME VIDEO
Download available at:
http://www.nzone.com/object/nzone_frontlines_videos.html


Description
Targets the graphic card purchaser’s hunger for the latest software that takes advantage of the greater graphics power they just invested in, and they don't have to go onto the Internet and spend hours downloading, or wait in line at download sites. Demos and videos can be included on driver discs, built into demo compilation discs, or in the case of complete systems installed right onto the desktop.
Requirements
Packages or systems bearing the video must be marked as such, and any advertising done for those products should call out the inclusion of the video. Please contact Partner Marketing for the appropriate trademark messaging.

<

product.name: Videos - NVIDIA® Tesla GPU computing solutions
product.description:
Testimonial Videos from:<
    Acceleware: Acceleware with NVIDIA GPU computing solutions develops and markets acceleration products that bring unparalleled performance and speed to today's most strenuous and challenging compute and/or data-intensive demands. Evolved Machines: Neural Circuit Simulation
    Evolved Machines reverse-engineered brain circuits to develop a new paradigm for device technology. They achieved accelerations of approximately 130-fold with GPU computing solutions greatly increasing the speed of research of neural arrays. Headwave: Geophysical Data Analysis
    Original seismic data interpretation with NVIDIA GPU speeds-up oil and gas discovery. University of Illinois: NAMD/VMD: Complex Molecular Systems Simulation
    University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign’s (UIUC), Nanoscale Molecular Dynamics (NAMD) and Visual Molecular Dynamics (VMD) with NVIDIA GPU computing solutions advances simulation of complex molecular systems.

Click the Download link to download all 4 videos (200MB .zip file)<

    Evolved Machines reverse-engineered brain circuits to develop a new paradigm for device technology. They achieved accelerations of approximately 130-fold with GPU computing solutions greatly increasing the speed of research of neural arrays. Headwave: Geophysical Data Analysis
    Original seismic data interpretation with NVIDIA GPU speeds-up oil and gas discovery. University of Illinois: NAMD/VMD: Complex Molecular Systems Simulation
    University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign’s (UIUC), Nanoscale Molecular Dynamics (NAMD) and Visual Molecular Dynamics (VMD) with NVIDIA GPU computing solutions advances simulation of complex molecular systems.

Click the Download link to download all 4 videos (200MB .zip file)<

product.description:
NOW AVAILABLE
Enemy Territory: QUAKE WarsnTrademark
"NVIDIA Recommended" Co-branded Print Ad Template
"NVIDIA Recommended" Online Ad Template
"NVIDIA Recommended" Co-branded Poster

Screenshots
<





CALL NOW
Contact Your NVIDIA Rep
Contact your NVIDIA Regional Marketing Manager for assistance with obtaining any of the following assets. Assets are presented on a first come, first serve basis and your manager will be able to advise you on what assets are still available.

<






Title: Assets Update - Enemy Territory: QUAKE WarsnTrademark |
Publisher: Activision, Inc.

Developer: id Software / Splash Damage, Inc. |
Release Date: July 2007





Description: Experience the ultimate team and mission-based online warfare, defined by the acclaimed Wolfenstein: Enemy Territory, now set in the legendary QUAKE universe. Choose to play as the human Global Defense Forces or the invading alien menace, the Strogg. Each side has distinct classes, vehicles, and weapons to choose from, giving players countless ways to join the battle.


Key Features: MISSION-BASED COMBAT: Enemy Territory: QUAKE Wars pits teams against each other on a real battlefield, with military-style objectives (e.g. take out a key defense, destroy a target). As a result, everyone always knows where the action is - no more wandering. DEEP TEAMWORK: With -asymmetrically-designed” classes (10 in total), each team in Enemy Territory: QUAKE Wars provides a unique gameplay experience. The GDF and Strogg are two distinct armies with different strategies and tactics. Players are specifically rewarded for working as a team to accomplish mission objectives. INDIVIDUAL ROLE-PLAY: Using class-specific capabilities, players can be the linchpin of an entire operation, building a necessary bridge or infiltrating enemy defenses to enable a decisive missile strike. Players protect and revive each other when injured, so they can complete critical tasks for the team. UPGRADEABLE CAPABILITIES AND STATS: Over the course of a multi-mission campaign, players earn experience and promotions, and gain new capabilities to help the team. In addition, stats are globally recorded for players to track their rank and prestige in the Enemy Territory community. MEGATEXTURETM TECHNOLOGY: id Software, known for games using cutting-edge technology, has done it again. The revolutionary MegatexturenTrademark technology allows battlefields to extend to thehorizon, with over a square mile of unique terrain at unprecedented detail.








PRINT AD TEMPLATE
Description
This full-page template leverages the endorsement of the TWIMTBP program for use in ads featuring NVIDIA products. The lower portion of the ad is designed to be tailored to fit individual partner messaging and can range from featuring specific technology, to promoting several systems featuring NVIDIA technology. Alternately, the "software" portion can be integrated into a website as a large banner with products appearing underneath.
Requirements
Ads must be accompanied by a minimum 3-week run of a banner on the partner's website. Artwork must be approved by NVIDIA prior to publication. Ad placements should be coordinated with NVIDIA so that exposure can be measured.
Availability
To prevent over-saturation and to foster strategic placement, availability of this template is limited. When the target exposure is reached the template will be retired and will no longer be approved for use.
Deliverables
The template is available two ways. 1) As a layered PSD file suitable for your customization. 2) Furnished as final art files customized to your specification. Artwork customization $450 + $75 per publication - 2 week turnaround. Customization charges waived with minimum of 2 prime ad placements.

<















ONLINE AD TEMPLATES
Description
Templates are available in three popular sizes, 160x600, 728x90, and 300x250. NVIDIA can create custom sizes in the case of a significant placement.
Requirements
Artwork must be approved by NVIDIA prior to publication. Ad placements should be coordinated with NVIDIA so that exposure can be measured. Screen captures of the running ads must be provided to NVIDIA for auditing.
Availability
To prevent over-saturation and to foster strategic placement, availability is limited. When the target exposure is reached the templates will be retired and will no longer be approved for use.
Deliverables
The templates are available two ways. 1) As a layered customizable PSD file. 2) As final art files customized to your specification. Artwork customization $225 per size - 1 week turnaround. Charges waived with minimum of 2 ad placements.


Banner Buddy
This title appears in the the NVIDIA Banner Buddy program. Drop a small bit of code into your website and not only will you add some pizzazz with constantly changing cool graphics, but your site will also receive reciprical exposure on nZone. Go to http://www.nzone.com/object/nzone_bannerbuddy_home.html for more information.

<















"NVIDIA RECOMMENDED" STICKER
Description
This 1.75" x 2.75" sticker leverages the endorsement of NVIDIA GPUs by the publisher. It is designed to be used on retail hardware packaging but can also be used as a small premium item. Other uses may be approved as requested.
Deliverables
The sticker is available two ways. 1) As a PSD file suitable for printing. 2) Printed on rolls available in lots of 500 at a cost of $120 per lot. The cost of up to 2 rolls is waived with a minimum of two ad placements (print, online, or combination).


"NVIDIA RECOMMENDED" BOX FLAP
Description
This artwork is designed to be incorporated into the printing of retail hardware packaging. Other uses may be approved as requested.
Availability
Availability is only limited by preemptive exclusivity agreements.
Deliverables
The artwork is available as a PSD file suitable for incorporating into package artwork.

<




Sticker <



Box Flap
<











POSTER
Description
This 18" x 24" poster is designed to grab attention and pull viewers into the message.
Availability
Availability is only limited by preemptive exclusivity agreements.
Deliverables
The poster is available three ways. 1) As a PSD file suitable for partner co-branding/messaging and printing on your own. 2) Printed with generic messaging in lots of 100 at a cost of $150 per lot. (Discount pricing available on quantities over 500 posters) The cost of up to 200 posters is waived with a minimum of two ad placements (print, online, or combination). 3) Custom printed with your co-branding/messaging. 500 posters @ $750+ship including artwork alterations. (1000 @ $850+ship)

<












NVIDIA's retail programs support your co-marketing efforts by magnifying the impression of your campaigns at retail point of sale. The programs are designed to impress consumers on the significance of purchasing the right graphics solution to run the top games and applications. Research shows that in addition to impact at point of sale, a message delivered at retail can effectively be carried to an E-tail or mail-order purchase decision.


For any given title a combination of the following items are delivered to retailers, NVIDIA-sponsored game centers and LAN parties. Placement at retail of any of these items is subject to NVIDIA merchandising agreements with the retailers. Placement may also be subject to specific alignment relative to partners running advertising (print or online).














SELL SHEETS
Description
Printed in full color on both sides of an 8.5" x 11" glossy, these sell sheets are designed to promote the awareness of a specific title and the NVIDIA graphics technology it uses. Sheets are 3-hole drilled for convenient insertion into sales associate binders. The front is an adaptation of the print ad template shown above and the back is a recreation of the publisher's sell sheet. 500 copies can be ordered for $490.


MOUSE PADS
Description
Hard top pads, 7.5" x 8.5" with a thin sponge rubber base. This item is a premium gift, collectible or leave-behind. They are available in lots of 250 @ $2.25ea and 500 @ $1.95ea.


POSTERS
Description
(See "Posters" in section above) This 18" x 24" poster is designed to grab attention and pull viewers into the message. Even retailers with strict planograms permit posters in employee areas such as break rooms.


SHELF TALKERS
Description
The base size of this item is 3" x 6". It is printed with the same image on both sides. The size may vary if required by a specific retailer. The primary method of attachment is a tab that fits in the shelf channel.


VERTICAL BANNERS
Description
These banners are 3' x 8', printed on one side and are produced on-demand at $225 ea. They can be used in the channel or for special events and trade shows. Portable stands are available on loan or for purchase.


SALES REP TRAINING
Online Training
NVIDIA’s online retail sales training reaches more than 1,700 store managers and sales representatives nationwide and includes Best Buy, Comp USA and others.
In-Store Training
Twice per month, a team of more than 35 NVIDIA associates visit over 400 retailers in the top markets. The associates focus on product awareness, training, and compliance checks. They’re able to deliver product messaging as well as collateral, demos and merchandise.

Title: Assets Update - Hellgate: London |
Publisher: Electronic Arts

Developer: Flagship Studios |
Release Date: Summer 2007





Description:HellgatenTrademark: London is the first original title from premier developer Flagship Studios.

Set in the near future, Hellgate: London introduces a world devastated by Demonic invasion and a desolate city scorched by hellfire. As one of only a few surviving Londoners, players must meld science and sorcery in order to gain a foothold against the minions of darkness and save the bloodline of humanity.

Hellgate: London combines the depth of role-playing games with the action of first-person shooters while offering infinite replayability and an individualized gaming experience with dynamically created levels, monsters, items, and events. Players create a hero and then battle through innumerable hordes of demons while completing quests and advancing through experience levels and branching skill paths. A robust, flexible skill and spell system, highly-customizable items, and a massive variety of randomly generated equipment will allow players to create a hero that is truly unique.

Key Features: The RPG Authority - Flagship Studios was founded by the core creators of Diablo, one of the biggest PC gaming franchises in history with over 13 million units sold worldwide - they are the first, last and only voice in the world of action RPGs. Beyond RPG - Experience new layers to the traditional hack-and-slash forumla by experiencing the action RPG from the first-person perspective and through nontraditional character classes and playstyles. Have it your way - Three unique factions with their own visual and gameplay style, offering something for every type of gamer, whether they prefer the longer-range blasts of the Hunter or want to get up close and personal with the Templar. Infinite Replayability - Dynamically generated levels, chance events and massive quantities of randomly created items makes for infinite replayability -- no two experiences will ever be the same and every game will be it’s own unique event. Mad Skills - Each faction has three character classes that contain a wide variety of skills and spells that are fully customizable. London Calling - Explore post-apocalyptic London, even darker and gloomier than usual. From shattered cathedrals and landmarks to the ancient ruins buried beneath the shell of a once-great city, players will need to scour all of London in search of the unknown. Misery Loves Company - Don’t be a glory hog - fight online. Gather with friends or recruit strangers in Underground stations and venture out into mean streets of London together to erase the Demonic threat. Hell Never Looked Better - HellGate: London features all of the latest next-generation technology to deliver a true, DX10 experience, while being fully scalable for optimal performance on older PCs.

<






Title: Assets Update - Crysis |
Publisher: Electronic Arts

Developer: Crytek |
Release Date: November 2007





Description:
Crysis is a next-generation PC first-person shooter from Crytek, the award-winning developers of Far Cry. A stunning technical achievement, Crysis combines incredible visuals, cunning gameplay and an epic story that challenges gamers to adapt to survive.

Key Features: A unique three-act structure forces the player to use real-time armor and weapons customization to adapt constantly to an ever-changing world. Encounter a frightening and totally original alien species—they use their senses intelligently and work together to present the most challenging enemy yet in an FPS. Control of a variety of land, sea, and air vehicles including trucks, tanks, boats, and helicopters. Explore a living, dynamic world where earthquakes, breaking ice, landslides, and tornados pose an ever-present threat. 32-player multiplayer with real-time armor and weapons customization, plus an all-new multiplayer mode that combines player modification and tactical objectives. Emergent gameplay means that in-game actions affect future outcomes and give each player a unique experience. Highly robust and easy-to-use mod toolset allows players to create their own expansive levels for both multiplayer and single-player modes. The CryENGINE 2 engine delivers the most realistic environments, spectacular special effects, physics game engine, lighting system, and enemy Al.








PRINT AD TEMPLATE
Description
This full-page template leverages the endorsement of the TWIMTBP program for use in ads featuring NVIDIA products. The lower portion of the ad is designed to be tailored to fit individual partner messaging and can range from featuring specific technology, to promoting several systems featuring NVIDIA technology. Alternately, the "software" portion can be integrated into a website as a large banner with products appearing underneath.
Requirements
Artwork must be approved by NVIDIA prior to publication.
Availability
To prevent over-saturation and to foster strategic placement, availability of this template is limited. When the target exposure is reached the template will be retired and will no longer be approved for use.
Deliverables
The template is available two ways. 1) As a layered PSD file suitable for your customization. 2) Furnished as final art files customized to your specification. Artwork customization - 2 week turnaround.

<















ONLINE AD TEMPLATES
Description
Templates are available in three popular sizes, 160x600, 728x90, and 300x250. NVIDIA can create custom sizes in the case of a significant placement.
Requirements
Artwork must be approved by NVIDIA prior to publication. Screen captures of the running ads must be provided to NVIDIA for auditing.
Availability
To prevent over-saturation and to foster strategic placement, availability is limited. When the target exposure is reached the templates will be retired and will no longer be approved for use.
Deliverables
The templates are available two ways. 1) As a layered customizable PSD file. 2) As final art files customized to your specification. Artwork customization - 1 week turnaround.


Banner Buddy
This title appears in the the NVIDIA Banner Buddy program. Drop a small bit of code into your website and not only will you add some pizzazz with constantly changing cool graphics, but your site will also receive reciprical exposure on nZone. Go to http://www.nzone.com/object/nzone_bannerbuddy_home.html for more information.

<

Description
This 1.75" x 2.75" sticker leverages the endorsement of NVIDIA GPUs by the publisher. It is designed to be used on retail hardware packaging but can also be used as a small premium item. Other uses may be approved as requested.
Deliverables
The sticker is available as a PSD file suitable for printing.


"NVIDIA RECOMMENDED" BOX FLAP
Description
This artwork is designed to be incorporated into the printing of retail hardware packaging. Other uses may be approved as requested.
Availability
Availability is only limited by preemptive exclusivity agreements.
Deliverables
The artwork is available as a PSD file suitable for incorporating into package artwork.

<




Sticker <

POSTER
Description
This 18" x 24" poster is designed to grab attention and pull viewers into the message.
Availability
Availability is only limited by preemptive exclusivity agreements.
Deliverables
The poster is available three ways. 1) As a PSD file suitable for partner co-branding/messaging and printing on your own. 2) Printed with generic messaging in lots of 100 at a cost of $150 per lot. (Discount pricing available on quantities over 500 posters) The cost of up to 200 posters is waived with a minimum of two ad placements (print, online, or combination). 3) Custom printed with your co-branding/messaging. 500 posters @ $750+ship including artwork alterations. (1000 @ $850+ship)

<












NVIDIA's retail programs support your co-marketing efforts by magnifying the impression of your campaigns at retail point of sale. The programs are designed to impress consumers on the significance of purchasing the right graphics solution to run the top games and applications. Research shows that in addition to impact at point of sale, a message delivered at retail can effectively be carried to an E-tail or mail-order purchase decision.


For any given title a combination of the following items are delivered to retailers, NVIDIA-sponsored game centers and LAN parties. Placement at retail of any of these items is subject to NVIDIA merchandising agreements with the retailers. Placement may also be subject to specific alignment relative to partners running advertising (print or online).














MOUSE PADS
Description
Hard top pads, 7.5" x 8.5" with a thin sponge rubber base. This item is a premium gift, collectible or leave-behind. They are available in lots of 250 @ $2.25ea and 500 @ $1.95ea.


POSTERS
Description
(See "Posters" in section above) This 18" x 24" poster is designed to grab attention and pull viewers into the message. Even retailers with strict planograms permit posters in employee areas such as break rooms.


VERTICAL BANNERS
Description
These banners are 3' x 8', printed on one side and are produced on-demand at $225 ea. They can be used in the channel or for special events and trade shows. Portable stands are available on loan or for purchase.

Title: Assets Update - Bioshock |
Publisher: 2K Games

Developer: Irrational Games |
Release Date: August 21, 2007





Description: BioShock is the "genetically enhanced" first person shooter that lets you do things never before possible in the genre: turn everything into a weapon, biologically mod your body with plasmids, hack devices and systems, upgrade your weapons and craft new ammo variants, and experiment with different battle techniques.

You are a cast-away in Rapture, an underwater Utopia torn apart by civil war. Caught between powerful forces, and hunted down by genetically modified "splicers" and deadly security systems, you have to come to grips with a deadly, mysterious world filled with powerful technology and fascinating characters. No encounter ever plays out the same, and no two gamers will play the game the same way.

Key Features: Take control of your world by hacking mechanical devices, commandeering security turrets and crafting unique items critical to your very survival. Upgrade your weapons with ionic gels, explosives and toxins to customize them to the enemy and environment. Genetically modify your body through dozens of Plasmid Stations scattered throughout the city, empowering you with fantastic and often grotesque abilities. Explore a living world powered by Ecological A.I., where the inhabitants have interesting and consequential relationships with one another that impact your gameplay experience. Experience truly next generation graphics that vividly illustrate the forlorn art deco city, highlighted by the most detailed and realistic water effects ever developed in a video game. Make meaningful choices and mature decisions, ultimately culminating in the grand question: do you exploit the innocent survivors of RapturenPipeor save them?

Title: Assets Update - Civilization IV: Beyond the Sword |
Publisher: 2K Games

Developer: Firaxis Games |
Release Date: Now Available





Description: Sid Meier's Civilization IV: Beyond the Sword is the second expansion pack for Civilization IV - the 2005 PC Game of the Year that has become a world-wide hit. The expansion will focus on the time periods after the invention of gunpowder and will deliver 11 unique and challenging scenarios created by the development team at Firaxis as well as some esteemed members of the Civ Community. Civ IV: Beyond the Sword will also include ten new civilizations, sixteen new leaders, five new wonders, and a variety of new units that will offer even more fun and exciting ways for players to expand their civilization's power as they strive for world domination.


Key Features: Expanded Epic Game: Firaxis Games has delivered a massive increase in new units, buildings, and technologies to the epic game with a tremendous amount of effort focused on the late game. New Game Scenarios: The expansion will deliver 11 new scenarios, many containing themes never seen in Civilization, custom designed by the team at Firaxis and some members of the Civ Fan Community. New Civilizations: The pack will provide 10 new civilizations, such as Portugal, Babylonians and Netherlands and their associated unique units and buildings. More Civilization Leaders: Sixteen new leaders will be provided. The list will include leaders for the new civilizations, as well as additional leaders for existing civilizations. Corporations: A new gameplay feature similar to religion that allows players to found companies and spread them throughout the world. Each corporation provides benefits in exchange for certain resources. Espionage: Now available much earlier in the game, this expanded feature offers players many new ways to spy on opponents, stir citizen unrest and defend your own government's secrets. Events: New random events - such as natural disasters, pleas for help, or demands from their citizens - challenge players with obstacles that must be overcome for their civilizations to prosper. New Wonders: Five new wonders await discovery including the Statue of Zeus, Cristo Redentor, Shwedagon Paya, the Mausoleum of Maussollos, and the Moai Statues. Expanded Space Victory: Winning the race to Alpha Centauri will now require more strategic planning and tactical decision making. Apostolic Palace: The United Nations will become available earlier in the game providing a way for players to win a diplomatic victory earlier. New resolutions will also be added which will expand the available diplomatic options. Advanced Starts: A major fan request, this new feature will enable players to "buy" components of a custom-tailored empire and begin play in the later part of the game, allowing them to experience many of the new features of the expansion in a shorter amount of time. Enhanced AI: The AI has received many enhancements making it tougher to beat on the higher difficulty levels. The ways in which the AI will attempt to achieve victory have also been expanded.

Developer: CAPCOM CO., LTD. |
Release Date: Summer 2007





Description: Driven to the brink of extinction on ice-covered wastelands, humankind fights to survive. From extreme conditions and insurgent Snow Pirates to hostile gargantuan alien Akrid, all that you can trust are your instincts. Combining a gripping single player campaign and intense multiplayer modes with support for up to 16 players online, Lost Planet is an epic gaming masterpiece. Enormous world maps unfold as players' battle across vast snow fields and deserted cities either on foot or in armed, robotic Vital Suits.


Key Features: Enhanced DirectX 10 graphics Intense multiplayer action Command heavily armored Vital Suits Battle hordes of colossal Akrid

Title: Assets Update - World In ConflictnTrademark |
Publisher: Sierra Entertainment, Inc.

Developer: Massive Entertainment |
Release Date: September 18, 2007





Description:War is Coming Home

On November 9th, 1989 the Cold War was supposed to end…it didn't.

World in Conflict is the action strategy game where players defend their country, their hometown, and their families in the face of Soviet-led World War III, delivering an epic struggle of courage and retribution. You are a field commander leading the era's most powerful military machines in the heroic effort to turn back the invasion…one city and suburb at a time. This war isn't on television. It's on our soil and in our backyards.

Prepare yourself for the most intense strategy game ever created.

Key Features:War is Coming Home
- Fight in towns, suburbs, and cities based on real-life locations in America, Western Europe, and the USSR.
- Experience a chillingly plausible single player campaign crafted by Red Storm Rising co-author and Tom Clancy collaborator Larry Bond.

Unmatched Visual Payoff
- The battlefield explodes in a fury of cinematic action with World in Conflict's ground breaking graphics technology that supports DirectX 10 and DirectX 9.
- Permanently destroy the environment - beautiful, yet deadly artillery, air, and nuclear strikes lay waste to the landscape.
- View the conflict from every angle with amazing 360° camera control that can effortlessly get right down in the midst of combat or view the entire battlefield.

The Most Intense Strategy Game Ever Created
- Choose the units you want right away and join the fight in seconds - its all about explosive action. - Employ breathtaking super weapons like ground-shaking artillery barrages, napalm strikes, and awesome tactical nukes.

Fast Paced Teamplay
- Battle online with up to 16 players. Coordinate your attacks with VOIP support.
- You'll master four different player roles; Air, Armor, Infantry and Support, in the ultimate online teamplay experience.
- Drop in multiplayer allows you to join on-going games and immediately help your team take control of the map.

Title: Assets Update - The Lord of the Rings OnlinenTrademark |
Publisher: Midway

Developer: Turbine |
Release Date: Now Available





Description: Live the greatest fantasy of all time. The War of the Ring has commenced! As the Fellowship embarks on its quest to destroy the One Ring, you must defend the Free Peoples against Sauron's evil minion, the Witch-king. Adventure solo or forge fellowships, battle hideous monsters, and rise to fame in the only massively multi-player online game based on the Books of J.R.R. Tolkien.


Key Features: Adventure through Middle-earth: Explore renowned places like the Shire and Rivendell. Interact with Gandalf and Bilbo. Advance Your Hero: Use deeds, traits and titles to advance your character in new ways. Monster Battles: Jump into monster vs. player combat. Connect with your fellowship: Integrated voice chat, instant messaging and more keep you connected to other gamers.

VERTICAL BANNERS
Description
These banners are 3' x 8', printed on one side and are produced on-demand at $225 ea. They can be used in the channel or for special events and trade shows. Portable stands are available on loan or for purchase.

product.name: Sales Sheet - Essential Vista
product.description:
Windows Vista and NVIDIA GeForce GPUs enable a refi ned and seamless user experience, smoother applications, and
high-defi nition video playback.

Jump in and immerse yourself in this new experience - computing will never be the same.<

product.name: Cheat Sheet - Essential Vista
product.description: Windows Vista is the first Windows operating system that directly utilizes the power of a dedicated GPU (graphics processing unit). NVIDIA® GeForce® GPUs are essential for accelerating the Windows Vista experience by offering an enriched 3D user interface, increased productivity, vibrant photos, smooth, high-deinition videos, and realistic games. To fully experience Windows Vista, Microsoft and other industry experts recommend using a PC that is 10 times more powerful than those required by previous generations of Windows. NVIDIA nForce®-based PCs deliver the uncompromising performance, quality and reliability essential for the full Windows Vista experience.

product.name: Print Ad Template - Essential Vista
product.description: Windows Vista is the first Windows operating system that directly utilizes the power of a dedicated GPU (graphics processing unit). NVIDIA® GeForce® GPUs and NVIDIA nForce®-based motherboards are essential for accelerating the Windows Vista experience by offering an enriched 3D user interface, increased productivity, and vibrant photos as well as delivering uncompromising performance, quality, and reliability.

product.name: Why Do You Need a GPU? - Retail Demo Kiosk
product.description: The -Why Do You Need a GPU” retail demo kiosk is a simple interactive and self-running educational tool you can install and display on PCs to demonstrate the benefits of a Graphics Processing Unit (GPU) beyond video games. It provides a glimpse of all the new applications available today that take advantage of the GPU - including photos, videos, and maps, and also illustrates the performance benefits when a dedicated GPU offloads the graphics work from the CPU.

product.name: Demo Video - Essential Vista (Low WMV 64MB)
product.description:
The Essential Vista video emphasizes the importance of an NVIDIA GeForce GPU for Microsoft's upcoming Windows Vista operating system, and details the value of a dedicated graphics processor for enhanced productivity, performance, photos, videos and games.

The video can be used on on a web site or in-store on systems using a GeForce GPU.

product.description:
