The video can be used on on a web site or in-store on systems using a GeForce GPU.

product.name: NVIDIA Essential Vista Logo Requirements/Guidelines
product.description:
<Requirements/Guidelines
Overview
The NVIDIA Essential Vista logo is intended to highlight NVIDIA-based systems that will provide an excellent end-user experience when running Windows Vista, especially when using the more sophisticated Windows Aero user interface.

Eligibility
The NVIDIA Essential Vista logo may be used to promote graphics cards based on GeForce® 6 or GeForce 7 GPUs, as well as motherboards based on discrete NVIDIA nForce® 4 or NVIDIA nForce 5 series MCPs.

To be eligible to use the NVIDIA Essential Vista logo to promote a PC, the system must contain at least one of the following elements:<
    One or more NVIDIA GeForce 6 or GeForce 7 GPUs A motherboard based on a discrete NVIDIA nForce 4 or NVIDIA nForce 5 series MCP

product.name: Print Ad Template - NVIDIA® GeForce® 8800 GPUs and NVIDIA nForce® 600i Series MCPs Platform
product.description: Redefine reality with NVIDIA’s definitive gaming platform. The new NVIDIA® GeForce® 8800 graphics processing units (GPUs) and NVIDIA nForce® 600 Series media communications processors (MCPs) are architected for maximum gaming performance. With up to 2X the performance of previous generations, GeForce 8800 GPUs provide unparalleled levels of graphics realism and image quality, while NVIDIA nForce 600 Series MCPs deliver incomparable system performance for both Intel and AMD processors.

product.description: Get your game on with a kick-ass system equipped with an NVIDIA nForce motherboard. NVIDIA nForce® 650i SLInTrademark media and communications processors (MCPs) are designed for gamers. NVIDIA® SLI technology combines two NVIDIA GeForce® graphics cards for scalable graphics performance, online game traffic takes priority with NVIDIA FirstPacketnTrademark technology, and NV BIOS with NVIDIA nTunenTrademark brings easy to implement extreme overclocking for an overall experience beyond reality.

product.description:
50 Words
Notebooks based on NVIDIA® GeForce® Go 6150 and 6100 GPUs with NVIDIA nForce® Go 430 MCP include innovative power management technology allowing notebooks to run longer on battery power. The GPU includes NVIDIA® PureVideonTrademark technology for high-definition playback and runs popular games using Microsoft® DirectX® 9.0 Shader Model 3.0.

50 words
Watch videos on your desktop, notebook, or HDTV without annoying artifacts and stuttering. NVIDIA® PureVideonTrademark technology delivers ultra-smooth high-definition H.264, VC-1, WMV and MPEG-2 video with minimal CPU utilization and low power consumption. In addition, PureVideo adjusts to any display, ensuring the picture will always be crisp and the colors vibrant and lifelike.

product.description:
<10, 25, 50, 100 words<<50 words
As a specialized processor dedicated to graphics, the NVIDIA® GeForce® 7300 LE graphics processing unit (GPU) offloads graphics processing from your CPU and increases overall system performance. In addition to improving performance, the GeForce 7300 LE also delivers advanced 3D graphics and video features to provide an incredible multimedia experience on the PC. (53 words)<

product.name: Product Overview - NVIDIA® GoForce® family of handheld graphics processing units (GPUs)
product.description:
A revolution is underway in handheld technology. From digital television to high-resolution photography, from immersive audio/video playback to interactive 3D games, consumers not only want it all, they want it with the quality they demand from standalone digital devices.
Renowned for creating innovative, industry-changing products, NVIDIA® makes entertainment on the go possible with the NVIDIA® GoForce® family of handheld graphics processing units (GPUs). With advanced chip and system level design techniques, NVIDIA delivers unmatched features andperformance to handheld devices, while maintaining long battery life that frees consumers to experience entertainment without limits.<

product.name: Marketing Tools
product.description:
Welcome to the marketing tools catalog! Please click on a category in the left menu to begin browsing.<

    Document Type - Browse for tools by type of document: Web Banners, Print Ad Templates, Line Cards, etc.
    Essential Vista - Tools that specifically emphasize the importance of an NVIDIA GPU for the Microsoft Windows Vista operating system
    NSIST on NVIDIA - Tools that feature the NSIST on NVIDIA messaging. For digital editing, gaming or simply better overall performance, your customers should NSIST on NVIDIA for their graphics solution
    Product - Browse for tools by product family. Downloads are organized first by GPU or MCP and then by product platform, Desktop, Notebook or Workstation
    TWIMTBP - Tools and templates that leverage the endorsement of the The Way It's Meant To Be Played program for games developed and optimized on NVIDIA hardware
